sentences.en: " Doodle - bug, doodle - bug, tell me what I want to know!
sentences.cn: “ 小甲虫, 小甲虫, 告诉我这究竟是怎么回事!

sentences.en: a 24-hour flu bug
sentences.cn: 一天即愈的流感

sentences.en: bugged out on his partners at the first sign of trouble.
sentences.cn: 在第一次遇到麻烦时他就离开了同伴

sentences.en: Don't bug me please.
sentences.cn: 请不要打扰我.

sentences.en: He wants to put a bug in her ear.
sentences.cn: 他想提醒她一下.

sentences.en: I only did it to bug my parents.
sentences.cn: 我这么做只是为了让我父母心烦。

sentences.en: I think I've got a bit of a stomach bug.
sentences.cn: 我想我的胃可能出了点儿毛病。

sentences.en: I'm not feeling well, I must have picked up a bug somewhere.
sentences.cn: 我感觉不舒服, 一定是在什么地方感染病菌了.

sentences.en: I've definitely been bitten by the gardening bug.
sentences.cn: 我被园艺彻底迷住了。

sentences.en: if you see enemy troops, bug out.
sentences.cn: 如看见敌军，你们就迅速撤退。

sentences.en: In his sleeping bag he'll be as snug as a bug in a rug.
sentences.cn: 躺在睡袋里他会感觉温暖又舒适.

sentences.en: Is it true the whole camp is going to bug out in the morning, captain?
sentences.cn: 上尉,是不是整个军营在早晨都要撤离?

sentences.en: men's eyes bug out when she walks past.
sentences.cn: 当她路过时，男人们的眼珠子都鼓出来了。

sentences.en: Roundhay Park in Leeds was the place I first got the fishing bug.
sentences.cn: 利兹市的朗德海公园是我首次对钓鱼着迷的地方。

sentences.en: The bird caught a bug on the fly.
sentences.cn: 那鸟在飞行中捉住了一只昆虫.

sentences.en: There is a bug in the software.
sentences.cn: 软件有漏洞。

sentences.en: There is a bug in the system.
sentences.cn: 系统出了故障.

sentences.en: There was a bug going around at the club.
sentences.cn: 这个俱乐部流行着一种轻微的传染病。

sentences.en: There’s a nasty bug going round (=  that a lot of people have caught  ) .
sentences.cn: 现在流行着一种很烦人的传染病。

sentences.en: We noticed tiny bugs that were all over the walls.
sentences.cn: 我们发现墙上爬满了小虫。

sentences.en: We were bug-eyed in wonderment.
sentences.cn: 我们非常惊奇，眼珠都快瞪出来了。

words.tran_cn: 装窃听器；打扰；把…弄糊涂；除虫（bug的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 逃避：逃避责任或义务，常与&I{on} 或 &I{of} 连用

phrases.phrase: bug out N. Amer. informal 北美，非正式
put a bug in (someone's) ear【非正式用语】
phrases.tran_cn: 事先给某人暗示：用隐秘的、谨慎的方式将有用的信息告诉他人

trans.tran_cn: 虫子，小病，（计算机程序中的）故障，窃听器，热衷
trans.tran_en: a small piece of electronic equipment for listening secretly to other people’s conversations

trans.tran_cn: 在…装窃听器，窃听，使烦恼
trans.tran_en: to put a  bug (=  small piece of electronic equipment  )  somewhere secretly in order to listen to conversations

trans.tran_cn: 烦扰， 纠缠； 在…装窃听器
trans.tran_en: to put a  bug (=  small piece of electronic equipment  )  somewhere secretly in order to listen to conversations
